Articles.Content:
Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems 1.1.3

 

Chaka Monkey 1.1.3 Dropbox Link

Chaka Monkey 1.1.3 Spacedock Link

Chaka Monkey 1.1.3 CF Link

 

Click here to "Get Monkey"

 

 

 












 

 

Chaka Monkey Exploration Odyssey is a space program based on NASA and Boeing proposals for future missions. Part models from a wide variety of authors have been licensed, and new original models made, then combined with all new textures, sizes and configurations, to create craft files depicting the proposed missions. This project is modeled at 75% real scale.

 

♦ Recommend installing this pack into a clean KSP install for the first time.

♦ Latest version of Raster Prop Monitor needed for IVA function. Link included in download.

♦ Copy everything in provided GameData to your GameData

♦ Copy VAB folder to Ships

♦ Copy Subassemblies to your save (optional)

♦ Please remove any previous version files before installing!

Chaka the Monkey would like to extend a special thank you to these developers. They worked very hard to make these parts and we have organized them for Monkey Exploration because they are excellent. Also Chaka wishes to thank our excellent beta test team: Voidryder, AJLSpace85, JoseEduardo, MeCripp, Probus, Drj3199 for putting in many hours of science which made the quality of this release possible.

Edited September 9, 2016 by YANFRET
I'M SO HAPPY!!!!
YAY!! Finally an update for one of my favorite mods!!!

Dear Esteemed Monkey Rocket Designers,

We, your humble colleagues at Void Aerospace enthusiastically salute your latest grand achievement with all honest sincerity.  It is remarkable engineering feat. 

As you are undoubtedly aware Void Aerospace had to cease all launch operations due to pesky inquiry from Central Committee based upon unfounded

accusations of safety violations from handful of surviving staff and/or their widows.

However with clever name change, we expect to resume all space exploration activities using Monkey's outstanding launch vehicles, command modules and landers

as soon as paint dry on new sign.

Best Wishes Always,

The Grand Designer

Void Aerospace Inc

P.S. See new name? Lawyers say adding Inc means all new company. Did not explain what Inc means though. Happy launching!

Mk1-2 Pod IVA Replacement by ASET wants to be updated in CKAN, citing "Chaka Monkey Exploration System" as the mod version. Not sure what this is all about but I don't trust it until I see some documentation or more info.

On 8/8/2016 at 1:30 PM, Tossy64 said:

Mk1-2 Pod IVA Replacement by ASET wants to be updated in CKAN, citing "Chaka Monkey Exploration System" as the mod version. Not sure what this is all about but I don't trust it until I see some documentation or more info.

Sure. 

 

Nice as it is, the venerable 1-2 Pod IVA replacement has not been recently updated. You gotta give Alex some IRL time before he swings back around to that. There shouldn't be any real issues other than that particular CKAN message.

 

We are extremely pleased with the quality of ASET products and our partnership with their development team. Chaka will continue to support our license agreement and use that IVA group even if they are not updated soon.

 

 

Edited August 10, 2016 by YANFRET
Are there any plans to integrate this with CTT? I tried a career game with CTT and the CMES parts unlocked very early.

5 minutes ago, Bombaatu said:

Are there any plans to integrate this with CTT? I tried a career game with CTT and the CMES parts unlocked very early.

Would you be willing to make some suggestions?

Really we have to do so much testing in sandbox mode that career support is often a foreign language.
quick question: Does this support R.O or vice versa?

5 minutes ago, LordOfMinecraft99 said:

quick question: Does this support R.O or vice versa?

 

Sometimes. We will not explicitly support R.O. because keeping the pack running in stock KSP is complicated enough. However, from time to time various brave developers have taken it upon themselves to provide support. Indeed, even more brave developers have created new products dependant on those brave endeavours. 

Best luck!

14 hours ago, YANFRET said:

Sure. 

 

Nice as it is, the venerable 1-2 Pod IVA replacement has not been recently updated. You gotta give Alex some IRL time before he swings back around to that. There shouldn't be any real issues other than that particular CKAN message.

 

We are extremely pleased with the quality of ASET products and our partnership with their development team. Chaka will continue to support our license agreement and use that IVA group even if they are not updated soon.

 

 

I'm still unclear, what is updated with it?

I have realism overhaul installed but when i load the game it just stops on CMES/orion in the loading screen and just stays there.

Is there a way to fix this?

 

My Loading screen gets stuck on CMES/POD/orion_les/part/xOrionLES

is this because I have realism overhaul?

or do I need another mod?

17 hours ago, YANFRET said:

Would you be willing to make some suggestions?

Really we have to do so much testing in sandbox mode that career support is often a foreign language. 

It'll take some time, but yes

3 hours ago, Larste said:

I have realism overhaul installed but when i load the game it just stops on CMES/orion in the loading screen and just stays there.

Is there a way to fix this?

 

My Loading screen gets stuck on CMES/POD/orion_les/part/xOrionLES

is this because I have realism overhaul?

or do I need another mod?

Yes, we can not guarantee operation with R.O. at this time.

15 minutes ago, Bombaatu said:

It'll take some time, but yes

Please feel free to submit suggested changes as time allows and we will include them in the next update.

Edited August 10, 2016 by YANFRET

Quote

Yes, we can not guarantee operation with R.O. at this time.

Maybe you should have told me that rather than being vague

Could you please tell me and other forum users what parts support R.O and what parts do not/break the game? That would a lot more useful than talking about other developers. Sorry if I am being a bit snippy, I had like no sleep last night.

3 minutes ago, LordOfMinecraft99 said:

Maybe you should have told me that rather than being vague

Could you please tell me and other forum users what parts support R.O and what parts do not/break the game? That would a lot more useful than talking about other developers. Sorry if I am being a bit snippy, I had like no sleep last night.

We don't keep close tabs on which developers are volunteering their time to work on Chaka in RO / RSS at any given time and since we just released the update this week I didn't want to put work on their desk before they have time to get to it on their own. Typically the RSS port is in perpetual WIP status.

https://github.com/KSP-RO/RealismOverhaul/blob/master/GameData/RealismOverhaul/RO_Readme.txt

12 minutes ago, LordOfMinecraft99 said:

Maybe you should have told me that rather than being vague

 

17 hours ago, YANFRET said:

We will not explicitly support R.O.

 

How exactly is this being vague?

 

 

14 minutes ago, LordOfMinecraft99 said:

Sorry if I am being a bit snippy, I had like no sleep last night.

Lack of sleep should not be justification for making a jerky strike-through response. Maybe you should do some legwork on your end and browse through the packaged content instead of having everything spoon-fed to you.

 

@YANFRET, awesome work as usual!
Is there going to be RealPlume support?
@LordOfMinecraft99 @Larste RO support will come but due to the size and scope of the mod it will take a while. Please be patient.

Question for users:

 

We are planning a major update to Chaka that will greatly influence pack size and game play. Specifically, the pack will be split into two parts, based on the medium and heavy launch vehicles. Also, widespread simplification of lander technologies will result in reduced overall combined size on disk. 

While this work is completed, please reply here with your wish list of changes to the pack. 

Although we cannot guarantee requests will be granted, it would be helpful to have feedback at this time.

Edited September 7, 2016 by YANFRET

the eagle from space 1999 used to have it now we dont (. one of those with an aset cockpit would be pretty sweet. 

more cool rovers like the malmute, or any of the old bobcat ones. sucks about tracks being busted now. 

landing gear like the awesome adjustable landing gear that used to work. 

landing zones with sequential lighting like outland, aliens and stuff for our reusable stages to land on.

Lol .

Fantastic mod, Keep up the tremendous work .

I think it would be nice to have RealPlume support (Yeah , I know you told that you will not support RO but this is not really RO , and I get that this is a huge amount of work to make configs for all the engines , I just think it would make the whole pack to look better overall , also the stock plumes make me vomit) , If I would know how to write configs I would happily do this myself...(altough it's never too late to try)...
